def tiy_fizz_buzz(s):
    return "".join(("Iron "*c.isupper() + "Yard"*(c.lower() in "aeiou")).strip() or c for c in s)

def tiy_fizz_buzz(stg):
    return "".join("Iron Yard" if c in "AEIOU" else "Yard" if c in "aeiou" else "Iron" if c.isupper() else c for c in stg)
tiy_fizz_buzz=lambda x:''.join(('Iron'*e.isupper()+' '+'Yard'*(e.lower() in 'aiueo')).strip() or e for e in x)
